author: KAP🍂
text:
I’m not saying don’t hangout with s/o just keep into consideration of your friend too. Check in with them for sure. 
If you do already you’re great thank you:)
If you haven’t do so right now or when you can just make sure to ask:)
Also have a wonderful day you wonderful people:)

author: KAP🍂
text:
Fellow people in relationships! 
If you’re gonna hangout with your s/o please find time to hangout with your friends too!
You might not notice but we do get jealous/upset. Maybe for some of us we feel replaced too.

author: KAP🍂
text: I also don’t like many foods. For example peanut butter and celery. Oh and eggs. I don’t like those. I prefer apple juice over orange juice. I like space I don’t know much about it tho.

author: KAP🍂
text: I only have a few things I’m genuinely interested in. I really like collecting squish mellows and reading manga. I enjoy looking at insects and listening to random facts. Watching true crime with friends. I also like crystals.

author: KAP🍂
text: I watch anime sometimes. I’ve only seen a few all the way through tho. I’ve seen Haikyu!!, My hero academia, attack on titans, fruit basket, anhoma (I think that’s what it’s called it’s about this ghost girl and a guy and he has to try to get her to cross over.).
